title: Permutation ESports Trials Open (5/12/15 4.00pm AEST)
body:
Add burstfire301 in game on OCE server to apply. 
Trials are on saturday 5/12/15 at 4pm AEST.
Any rank can apply, but we will only be taking the top 8 players.
Make sure to have added and talked to burstfire301 before the trial date.
